Section.Catchline: Exceptions for certain instructional personnel from background screening requirements.

SectionBody.Text: Instructional personnel who are required to undergo level 2 background screening under s. 393.0655 or s. 402.305 and who meet the level 2 screening standards in s. 435.04 are not required to be rescreened in order to satisfy the screening requirements in s. 1012.32 if the instructional personnel:

Subsection.Text: Have completed the criminal history check within 5 years prior to having direct contact with students;
Are rescreened every 5 years and meet the level 2 screening standards; and
Have their fingerprints retained by the Department of Law Enforcement.
